trans-unit.source: Represents a WQL SELECT data query.
trans-unit.target: 表示 WQL SELECT 資料查詢。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Management.SelectQuery" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Management.SelectQuery" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Management.SelectQuery" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Management.SelectQuery" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 這是預設建構函式。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The entire query or the class name to use in the query.
trans-unit.target: 要在查詢中使用的完整查詢或類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The parser in this class attempts to parse the string as a valid WQL SELECT query.
trans-unit.target: 在這個類別中的剖析器 (Parser) 會嘗試將字串剖析為有效的 WQL SELECT 查詢。

trans-unit.source: If the parser is unsuccessful, it assumes the string is a class name.
trans-unit.target: 如果剖析器無法完成，會假設字串為類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Management.SelectQuery" /> class for the specified query or the specified class name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化指定查詢或指定類別名稱的 <see cref="T:System.Management.SelectQuery" /> 類別新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example initializes a <xref:System.Management.SelectQuery> by specifying a query.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會初始化<xref:System.Management.SelectQuery>藉由指定查詢。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that this is a schema query; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要指出這個是結構描述查詢，則為 <see langword="true" />否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="false" /> value is invalid in this constructor.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> 值在這個建構函式 (Constructor) 中不正確。

trans-unit.source: The condition to be applied to form the result set of classes.
trans-unit.target: 要套用來形成類別結果集 (Result Set) 的條件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Management.SelectQuery" /> class for a schema query, optionally specifying a condition.
trans-unit.target: 初始化結構描述 (Schema) 查詢的 <see cref="T:System.Management.SelectQuery" /> 類別新執行個體，可選擇指定條件。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example initializes a <xref:System.Management.SelectQuery> by specifying a condition.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會初始化<xref:System.Management.SelectQuery>所指定的條件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the class to select in the query.
trans-unit.target: 要在查詢中選取的類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The condition to be applied in the query.
trans-unit.target: 要在查詢中套用的條件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Management.SelectQuery" /> class with the specified class name and condition.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的類別名稱和條件，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Management.SelectQuery" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example initializes a <xref:System.Management.SelectQuery> by specifying a WMI class name and a condition.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會初始化<xref:System.Management.SelectQuery>藉由指定 WMI 類別名稱和條件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the class from which to select.
trans-unit.target: 要選取的來源類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The condition to be applied to instances of the selected class.
trans-unit.target: 要套用至所選取類別的執行個體條件。

trans-unit.source: An array of property names to be returned in the query results.
trans-unit.target: 要在查詢結果中傳回的屬性名稱陣列。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Management.SelectQuery" /> class with the specified class name and condition, selecting only the specified properties.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的類別名稱和條件，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Management.SelectQuery" /> 類別的新執行個體，只選取指定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example initializes a <xref:System.Management.SelectQuery> by specifying a WMI class name, condition, and array of properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會初始化<xref:System.Management.SelectQuery>藉由指定 WMI 類別名稱、 條件和屬性的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Builds the query string according to the current property values.
trans-unit.target: 根據目前的屬性值建置查詢字串。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the class name to be selected from in the query.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在查詢選取的類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> value containing the name of the class in the query.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 值，內含查詢中的類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
trans-unit.target: 設定此屬性值會覆寫先前儲存在物件中的任何值。

trans-unit.source: The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new class name.
trans-unit.target: 查詢字串會重建以反映新的類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: A value for the **ClassName** property would replace the \<className> item in a SELECT query of the form "SELECT * FROM \<className> WHERE \<condition>".
trans-unit.target: 值**ClassName**屬性會取代\<類別名稱 > 格式的 SELECT 查詢中的項目 」 選取 * FROM\<類別名稱 > 其中\<條件 >"。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 屬性值

trans-unit.source: A string representing the name of the class in the query.
trans-unit.target: 表示在查詢中的類別名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example initializes a <xref:System.Management.SelectQuery> by specifying a query and then changes the <xref:System.Management.SelectQuery.ClassName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會初始化<xref:System.Management.SelectQuery>藉由指定查詢，然後變更<xref:System.Management.SelectQuery.ClassName%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the object.
trans-unit.target: 建立物件的複本。

trans-unit.source: The copied object.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the condition to be applied in the SELECT query.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在 SELECT 查詢中要套用的條件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> value containing the condition to be applied to the SELECT query.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 值，內含要套用至 SELECT 查詢的條件。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
trans-unit.target: 設定此屬性值會覆寫先前儲存在物件中的任何值。

trans-unit.source: The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new condition.
trans-unit.target: 查詢字串會重建以反映新的條件。

trans-unit.source: A value for the **Condition** property would replace the \<condition> item in a SELECT query of the form "SELECT * FROM \<className> WHERE \<condition>".
trans-unit.target: 值**條件**屬性會取代\<條件 > 格式的 SELECT 查詢中的項目 」 選取 * FROM\<類別名稱 > 其中\<條件 > 」。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 屬性值

trans-unit.source: A string containing the condition to be applied in the SELECT query.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含要在執行 SELECT 查詢中套用的條件。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this query is a schema query or an instances query.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出這個查詢是否為結構描述查詢或執行個體查詢。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value indicating whether the query is a schema query.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，指出查詢是否為結構描述查詢。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
trans-unit.target: 設定此屬性值會覆寫先前儲存在物件中的任何值。

trans-unit.source: The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new query type.
trans-unit.target: 查詢字串會重建以反映新的查詢類型。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 屬性值

trans-unit.source: `true` if this query should be evaluated over the schema; `false` if the query should be evaluated over instances.
trans-unit.target: `true` 如果此查詢應該評估結構描述。`false`如果應評估查詢，為整個執行個體。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The query string to be parsed.
trans-unit.target: 要剖析的查詢字串。

trans-unit.source: Parses the query string and sets the property values accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 剖析查詢字串，並相應的設定屬性值。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the query in the <see cref="T:System.Management.SelectQuery" /> object, in string form.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Management.SelectQuery" /> 物件中取得或設定字串格式的查詢。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> value containing the query.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含查詢的 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
trans-unit.target: 設定此屬性值會覆寫先前儲存在物件中的任何值。

trans-unit.source: In addition, setting this property causes the other members of the object to be updated when the string is reparsed.
trans-unit.target: 此外，設定這個屬性會導致其他成員物件的字串經過重新分析時，會更新。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 屬性值

trans-unit.source: A string representing the query.
trans-unit.target: 代表查詢的字串。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example initializes a <xref:System.Management.SelectQuery> with the default constructor and then changes the <xref:System.Management.SelectQuery.QueryString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會初始化<xref:System.Management.SelectQuery>此預設建構函式，然後變更使用<xref:System.Management.SelectQuery.QueryString%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Ggets or sets an array of property names to be selected in the query.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要在查詢中選取的屬性名稱陣列。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" /> containing the names of the properties to be selected in the query.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" />，內含要在查詢中選取的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object.
trans-unit.target: 設定此屬性值會覆寫先前儲存在物件中的任何值。

trans-unit.source: The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new properties.
trans-unit.target: 查詢字串會重建以反映新的屬性。

trans-unit.source: A value for the **SelectedProperties** property would replace the \<property> item in a SELECT query of the form "SELECT \<property> FROM \<className> WHERE \<condition>".
trans-unit.target: 值**SelectedProperties**屬性會取代\<屬性 > 中選取的查詢項目表單的 「 選取\<屬性 > FROM\<類別名稱 > 其中\<條件 > 」。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 屬性值

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection> containing the names of the properties to be selected in the query.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection>包含要在查詢中選取之屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
